column5: well I have had a hard time trying to get Misfish out fishing this year but opening weekend for bass and he was ready to go we decided to go to a secret river that runs through Bradford they were calling for rain, but I was sure it would hold off....NOT  we both got some bass, but some how Brian caught bigger ones, but he lost a real big one too  I got bit off 3 times and lost a real big dogfish, I am glad I didn't have to try to remove the hooks from the ugly thing..and I didn't need brain taking a picture of that.... the weeds were so thick much of the river is unfishable and can only get nastier as the summer progresses  anyways the rain ran us off the river, still it was great to get out and even ok to drag Misfish out   next  ...Smallmouth on simcoe

Well Terry I got to say,it sure was worth it.Heading out with you is always fun and a pleasure. Fishing was a little tough, but if we hit every fish we had hit,it would of been a great 4 hours of fishing.  Did you say smallies,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,not sure I want to leave the river.Flip.n is addict,n.  Til next time.
Secret river. lol Smallies are next but I hear you.  Only thing I like better than that is throwing weedless frogs over lilly pads and laydown reeds etc. nice bucket by the way.
Some nice fishg there gents....glad you had a good outing  Maueen
Awesome report, pics and video Terry WTG guys.... Keep it up Leechman
Looks like you boys did alright.
thanks the video is pretty bad, I was going to record the fish being brought in, till he yelled get the net then I couldn't point the camera
Good to see you guys get out fishing together.  Nice bass too!
Yea, he was just saying he's gonna be targeting Smallmouth on his next outing.
